Text: Can we get this as FLAC?
not to be confussed with https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6813228/Pink_Floyd_-_A_Foot_In_The_Door_The_Best_Of_Pink_Floyd_%282011%29MP3  so bubanee this is yet another best of floyd cd ?

No this is not another best of... although it has more of their popular songs... as stated in the description these songs have a begining and a end... totally different... 
and the answer to the flac... there is no flac to this collection but the first 5 songs are available in flac though here: 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7274238/Pink_Floyd_-_Defacing_The_Wall_2012_FLAC_[Bubanee]
